src:
Chelsea Menang 7 Laga Tandang Beruntun, Lampard Beberkan Rahasianya
04 Nov 2019, 11:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Chelsea berhasil meraih kemenangan saat berkunjung ke markas Watford. Pasukan Frank Lampard menaklukkan tuan rumah 2-1, Minggu (3/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Chelsea membuka skor melalui Tammy Abraham saat pertandingan berjalan lima menit. The Blues kemudian berhasil menggandakan kedudukan lewat Christian Pulisic pada babak kedua.
Gerard Delofeu mampu memperkecil skor lewat penalti di menit ke-80. Penalti ini dihadiahkan usai wasit Anthony Taylor mengecek VAR.
Chelsea pun berada peringkat empat klasemen sementara Premier League. Mereka mengumpulkan 23 poin dari 11 pertandingan.
text:
Chelsea wins 7 consecutive away games, Lampard reveals the secret
Nov 04 2019, 11:17 by Bola.net
Soccer - Chelsea managed to achieve victory when visiting Watford headquarters. Frank Lampard's troops conquered the host 2-1 on Sunday (3/11/2019) early morning hrs.
Chelsea opened the scoring through Tammy Abraham when the match ran for five minutes. The Blues then managed to double the position through Christian Pulisic in the second half.
Gerard Delofeu able to reduce the score through a penalty in the 80th minute. This penalty was awarded after the referee Anthony Taylor checked the VAR.
Chelsea are ranked fourth in the Premier League standings. They collected 23 points from 11 matches.
